hero.titleDescription: Artisan cookies made with real butter, intense flavors, and a nostalgic touch that makes you fall in love.

vainilla.name: Vanilla Chips
vainilla.description: Classic vanilla cookie filled with Hershey’s chocolate chips, topped with chocolate ganache and a white chocolate pearl.

chocolate.name: Intense Chocolate
chocolate.description: For chocolate lovers: an elegant cocoa cookie filled with Hershey’s chocolate chips, topped with chocolate ganache and cocoa.

red.name: Red Velvet
red.description: Enjoy an eternal holiday feeling with this innovative take on the classic Red Velvet cookie, filled with cranberries and topped with powdered sugar and cranberries.

marmoleada.name: Marbled
marmoleada.description: Enjoy the best of both worlds: vanilla and cocoa, filled with Hershey’s chocolate chips and topped with chocolate ganache and walnuts.

matcha.name: Matcha
matcha.description: A cookie with intense flavors, made with matcha, filled with white chocolate and coconut, and topped with white chocolate and coconut.

oreo.name: Oreo
oreo.description: A classic flavor in our bakery: delicious vanilla cookie with Oreo cookie pieces and topped with an Oreo cookie.

pop.name: Pop Caramel
pop.description: An explosion of flavors on your palate: a vanilla cookie with cajeta, filled with dark and white chocolate, topped with royal icing and popcorn.

taro.name: Unicorn Taro
taro.description: The unique flavor of taro combined with sliced almonds, topped with royal icing and marshmallows.

reyes.name: Kings
reyes.description: This limited-edition cookie adds an innovative touch to our classic cookie by replacing the topping with white chocolate and fruit paste.

contact.title: Cookies for your events
contact.description: We quote special orders for events, corporate gifts, and celebrations. Write to us and let’s create something delicious together.

comingSoon.comingSub: We are working on this section
comingSoon.comingDesc: Very soon you’ll find a new experience here, thoughtfully crafted with great care.
